description.originalText: Alycia is very friendly, outgoing, full of life, positivity and energy.  She's creative, optimistic, trustworthy, responsible and reliable.  She's also a good communicator and took direction really well. Overall, she always showed up energized and ready to take on the day with our toddler.  Our daughter adores Alycia and warmed up to her quickly and loved spending time with her, doing crafts and creative activities, exploring the parks and playgrounds in our town, visiting the library and other fun kid centric spaces and going on playdates and lunch/ ice cream dates.  They became close pals - she really made an impact on her. I would highly recommend her to another family.  We all adored her and she really helped our 3 year old develop in some ways that really helped prep her for the preK school environment she now thrives in.

description.displayText: Alycia has been a fantastic babysitter. Our kids love spending time with her and get excited so we would highly recommend her. She is engaged with the kids and always up for whatever game or activity they want to do. Alycia's communication when scheduling is excellent and she has never cancelled on us. Any family that hires her will be pleased and can feel confident that the kiddos will be well cared for when they are with her.

description.displayText: We have been thrilled to have Alycia take care of our son after school this year! She is flexible, has excellent communication skills, and has been diligent about helping us find alternate care when she is not available. She is kind, and thoughtful. It has been an absolute pleasure working with her.
